sourcesContent:
{{pokemon.name}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { PokemonCRUDService } from '../../../service/pokemon-crud.service'; import { Pokemon } from '../../../model/pokemon.model'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { HttpClient, HttpHeaders } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-pokemon-list', templateUrl: './pokemon-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./pokemon-list.component.css'] }) export class PokemonListComponent implements OnInit { pokemons: Pokemon[] = []; pokemonImg!: string; public previousButton: any; public nextButton: any; constructor(private pokemonCrudService: PokemonCRUDService, private http: HttpClient, private route: ActivatedRoute) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.showPokemonsWithId(); this.getNavigationButtons(); } showPokemonsWithId() { if(!this.pokemons.length){ this.pokemons = this.pokemonCrudService.getPokemonImage(null); } } getNavigationButtons() { this.pokemonCrudService.getPokemons().subscribe( (response) => { this.previousButton = response.previous; this.nextButton = response.next; } ) } goToNextSetOfResults() { let nextButton = (document.getElementById('next-btn') as HTMLButtonElement).value; this.getNavigationButtons(); this.pokemonCrudService.getPokemonImage(nextButton); } }
